00006 namespace CALICE {

00016   class SiPMCalibrationStatusBits : public BitSet {
00017   protected:
00018     enum ESiPMCalibrationStatusBitNo { kIsDead,                        
00019                                        kNoPedestal,                    
00020                                        kNoTemperature,                 
00022                                        // bits to show that defaults were used
00023                                        kMIPConstantIsDefault,          
00024                                        kMIPSlopeIsDefault,             
00025                                        kGainConstantIsDefault,         
00026                                        kGainSlopeIsDefault,            
00027                                        kInterCalibrationIsDefault,     
00028                                        kSaturationCorrectionIsDefault, 
00029                                        kPixelScaleIsDefault,           
00031                                        // bits to show that a value was scaled (e.g. for systematic studies)
00032                                        kMIPConstantIsScaled,          
00033                                        kMIPSlopeIsScaled,             
00034                                        kGainConstantIsScaled,         
00035                                        kGainSlopeIsScaled,            
00036                                        kInterCalibrationIsScaled,     
00037                                        kSaturationCorrectionIsScaled, 
00038                                        kPixelScaleIsScaled,           
00040                                        kNumberOfBits}; // just to count the number of bits
00041 
00042   public:
00048     SiPMCalibrationStatusBits() : BitSet(kNumberOfBits) {}
00049 
00055     SiPMCalibrationStatusBits(const int value) : BitSet(kNumberOfBits, value) {}
00056 
00057 
00058     bool isDead()     const { return getBit(kIsDead    ); }
00059     bool noPedestal() const { return getBit(kNoPedestal); }
00060     bool noTemperature() const { return getBit(kNoTemperature); }
00061 
00062     bool MIPConstantIsDefault()          const { return getBit(kMIPConstantIsDefault          ); }
00063     bool MIPSlopeIsDefault()             const { return getBit(kMIPSlopeIsDefault             ); }
00064     bool gainConstantIsDefault()         const { return getBit(kGainConstantIsDefault         ); }
00065     bool gainSlopeIsDefault()            const { return getBit(kGainSlopeIsDefault            ); }
00066     bool interCalibrationIsDefault()     const { return getBit(kInterCalibrationIsDefault     ); }
00067     bool saturationCorrectionIsDefault() const { return getBit(kSaturationCorrectionIsDefault ); }
00068     bool pixelScaleIsDefault()           const { return getBit(kPixelScaleIsDefault           ); }
00069 
00070     bool hasDefault() const { return MIPConstantIsDefault() ||
00071                                 MIPSlopeIsDefault() ||
00072                                 gainConstantIsDefault() ||
00073                                 gainSlopeIsDefault() ||
00074                                 interCalibrationIsDefault() ||
00075                                 saturationCorrectionIsDefault() ||
00076                                 pixelScaleIsDefault(); }
00077 
00078 
00079     bool MIPConstantIsScaled()          const { return getBit(kMIPConstantIsScaled          ); }
00080     bool MIPSlopeIsScaled()             const { return getBit(kMIPSlopeIsScaled             ); }
00081     bool gainConstantIsScaled()         const { return getBit(kGainConstantIsScaled         ); }
00082     bool gainSlopeIsScaled()            const { return getBit(kGainSlopeIsScaled            ); }
00083     bool interCalibrationIsScaled()     const { return getBit(kInterCalibrationIsScaled     ); }
00084     bool saturationCorrectionIsScaled() const { return getBit(kSaturationCorrectionIsScaled ); }
00085     bool pixelScaleIsScaled()           const { return getBit(kPixelScaleIsScaled           ); }
00086 
00087     bool hasScaled() const { return MIPConstantIsScaled() ||
00088                                MIPSlopeIsScaled() ||
00089                                gainConstantIsScaled() ||
00090                                gainSlopeIsScaled() ||
00091                                interCalibrationIsScaled() ||
00092                                saturationCorrectionIsScaled() ||
00093                                pixelScaleIsScaled(); }
00094 
00095 
00096     void setDead( const bool state = true )                       { setBit(kIsDead    , state); }
00097     void setNoPedestal( const bool state = true )                 { setBit(kNoPedestal, state); }
00098     void setNoTemperature( const bool state = true )              { setBit(kNoTemperature, state); }
00099 
00100     void setMIPConstantDefault( const bool state = true )          { setBit(kMIPConstantIsDefault          , state); }
00101     void setMIPSlopeDefault( const bool state = true )             { setBit(kMIPSlopeIsDefault             , state); }
00102     void setGainConstantDefault( const bool state = true )         { setBit(kGainConstantIsDefault         , state); }
00103     void setGainSlopeDefault( const bool state = true )            { setBit(kGainSlopeIsDefault            , state); }
00104     void setInterCalibrationDefault( const bool state = true )     { setBit(kInterCalibrationIsDefault     , state); }
00105     void setSaturationCorrectionDefault( const bool state = true ) { setBit(kSaturationCorrectionIsDefault , state); }
00106     void setPixelScaleDefault( const bool state = true )           { setBit(kPixelScaleIsDefault           , state); }
00107 
00108     void setMIPConstantScaled( const bool state = true )          { setBit(kMIPConstantIsScaled          , state); }
00109     void setMIPSlopeScaled( const bool state = true )             { setBit(kMIPSlopeIsScaled             , state); }
00110     void setGainConstantScaled( const bool state = true )         { setBit(kGainConstantIsScaled         , state); }
00111     void setGainSlopeScaled( const bool state = true )            { setBit(kGainSlopeIsScaled            , state); }
00112     void setInterCalibrationScaled( const bool state = true )     { setBit(kInterCalibrationIsScaled     , state); }
00113     void setSaturationCorrectionScaled( const bool state = true ) { setBit(kSaturationCorrectionIsScaled , state); }
00114     void setPixelScaleScaled( const bool state = true )           { setBit(kPixelScaleIsScaled           , state); }
